data.comment: The big names in today's match at bet365 Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at bet365 Stadium - Stoke kick-off to start the match.
At bet365 Stadium, Kevin Stewart has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nick Powell scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Penalty! Jarred Gillett points to the spot, great chance for Stoke...
It's now 2-0 to Stoke as Tyrese Campbell scores from the spot.
It's now 3-0 in Stoke as Sam Clucas scores for Stoke.
Grant McCann (Hull) is making a first substitution, with Daniel Batty replacing Kevin Stewart.
The first-half has come to a close in Stoke.
Hull kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Keane Lewis Potter is replacing Mallik Wilks for the away team.
The home team have replaced Joe Allen with Tashan Oakley-Boothe. This is the first substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Goal! Stoke extend their lead to 4-0 thanks to a Sam Clucas header.
Hull make their third substitution with George Honeyman replacing Martin Samuelsen.
Goal! Leonardo da Silva Lopes pulls one back for Hull to make it 4-1.
Leonardo da Silva Lopes is booked for the away team.
Goal! Nick Powell extends Stoke's lead to 5-1.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's second substitution at bet365 Stadium with Sam Vokes replacing Tyrese Campbell.
The home team replace Nick Powell with Lee Gregory.
The match has come to a close in Stoke. The final score is 5-1.
